requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: G4560 Dual Core Processor or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650ti 2GB or AMD RX 550 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 9400F or AMD Ryzen 3 3300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB or AMD RX 6600 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or higher
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or higher
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400

  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you want to hear the sounds. Don't expect anything spectacular though.
